name: FoxCiv
startIntroPart2: This is a nation capable of overthrowing any empire, stop us if you dare, but it will cost you dearly.!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be annihilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: As? Is our kingdom over? It's not possible, this is a nightmare and I want to wake up.
introduction: Gain? Piece of cake man. Lose? Impossible for our empire.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Wow! This battle was good, next time I won't hold back.
tradeRequest: Thank you! Your cooperation is appreciated (Licks his fur)
